text:
恋鐘はさ
どんなステージにしたいんだ？

Hmm～～～～...
If I had to say...

２８３のみんなでステージに立てるって聞いて
最初はアンティーカが引っ張らんと～～って

That's what I was thinkin', but
everyone really is an amazin' idol ya know.

Now I can't help but look forward to
standin' on stage with everyone in matchin' costumes...!

So like that, I'm hopin' that our performance'll convey 
that feelin' of looking forwad to the future!

Yeah, thinking about it... I hope it'll be a chance 
for everyone to show their personalities on stage.

Right...! Mano, Chiyuki, and Juri...
Each and e～very one of us.

A performance where everyones brilliant sparklin'
can reach ya...!
